snippet: Netflix subscribers had to decide this weekend whether to watch “House of Cards” all at once, or dribbled out. This led to much discussion on Twitter.
abstract: Netflix's all-at-once release of political thriller series House of Cards leads to confusion among viewers on social media who are unsure how to talk about show with others who have not yet watched all 13 episodes.
lead_paragraph: Netflix subscribers had to decide this weekend whether to watch “House of Cards” all at once, or dribbled out. This led to much discussion on Twitter.

headline.seo: Netflix’s ‘House of Cards’ Redefines the Spoiler Alert
headline.main: Release of 13 Episodes Redefines Spoiler Alert
headline.print_headline: Release of 13 Episodes Redefines Spoiler Alert
